data.actual_result: Nothing happens when you try to modify them.
data.expected_result: You should be able to modify these settings.
data.short_description: After canceling your server's deletion, you are unable to immediately change the settings in Overview.
data.steps_to_repro: - Own a server. - Go to Server Settings > Overview. - Scroll down and tap "Delete Server." - Tap "Yes." - When confirmation appears (either by 6 digit code, or server name), tap "Cancel." - Attempt to change the settings in Overview when it appears again. (Server Region, AFK Settings, Default Notification Settings)
